title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4118.4 - Acceptance of purse schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4118.4 - Acceptance of purse schedule

State Regulations

When a licensed harness race track advertises minimum
and/or total season's purses to be offered, or a formula whereby such purses
shall be determined, the acceptance of stabling at such race meeting by a
licensed owner, or trainer shall constitute an agreement to race for such
purses or to vacate such stabling promptly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4118.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
